text: .@SenGaryPeters & I are proud to see our legislation advance through the committee today with overwhelming bipartisan support as we approach the 50th anniversary of the Apollo 11 Moon landing. Our bill will put into place meaningful protections for the Apollo sites.

RT @jnoisecat In her latest plan, @ewarren takes on the carbon bubble by reintroducing the Climate Risk Disclosure Act, which would require corporations to disclose the risk posed to investors by climate actions and impacts in SEC filings. 

Very clever and very Warren. https://twitter.com/ewarren/status/1148940140389310465 QT @ewarren I've got a new plan to accelerate the transition to clean energy and combat climate change.
